title: Lockington Living Heritage Complex
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: A tour of significant heritage sites at Lockington as presented by the Lockington Living Heritage Complex. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Lockington'.
description: Celebrating and preserving the rich history of Lockington and its surrounding district, the dedicated and hard working volunteers of the Lockington Living Heritage Complex take us on a tour of the complex with the highlight being 'The Big Shed' which at 106 metres houses a restored Melbourne tram and the first ever pop top caravan, hand built in Lockington.
